column5: Sad, 11 year old boy and 15 year old girl struck by a jet ski while being pulled behind a pontoon boat on inner tubes. The boy is brain dead, be careful on the water people.  http://www.nydailynews.com/entertainment/gossip/usher-torn-stepson-11-declared-brain-dead-jet-ski-accident-article-1.1111294
That is beyond sad.  Why can't everyone leave a bit of room for others to enjoy themselves.
I don't care if you are an usher or the popcorn maker.   Jet skies suck.
Some sad news.  I hate Jet Skies and 90% of morons them.
Truly surprised it doesn't happen more often. Sad to see this happen to anyone.
+Very Sad .. +Hate Jet Skis... im sure its standard for most fisherman... On sunday they were cirling my boat all day it seemed... Brutal

I had 10 coming straight for me on Sunday night and it kind of looked like they were attacking. :-( A couple veared off closer to another boat fishing in very shallow weedy water and proceeded to do a couple of donuts. I just shook my head. I hate them. Too many people that have no idea what they are doing get behind those things. An accident waiting to happen, for sure. A very sad loss for all those involved.
